page.title: List of cases of police brutality

rev.comment: /* Pending investigations */ unnecessary fair use; image resides in main article where it is appropriate

Line 70: Line 70:
*October 14, 2007. [[Robert DziekaÅski Taser incident|Robert DziekaÅski]], a Polish immigrant arriving at the [[Vancouver International Airport]], died after being [[taser]]ed multiple times and four members of the [[Royal Canadian Mounted Police]] (RCMP) crowded on top of DziekaÅski. "The 40-year-old Dziekanski had been at the airport for about 10 hours and, unable to speak English, became confused and agitated while waiting for his mother to meet him."<ref>{{cite news | title =RCMP to review Taser policy in wake of airport death: commissioner |url = http://www.cbc.ca/canada/story/2007/11/17/rcmp-tasers.html | publisher = CBC | date = 2007-11-17 | accessdate = 2007-11-18 }}</ref><ref>{{cite news | title =Taser video shows RCMP shocked immigrant within 25 seconds of their arrival |url = http://www.cbc.ca/canada/british-columbia/story/2007/11/14/bc-taservideo.html | publisher = CBC | date = 2007-11-15 | accessdate = 2007-11-18 }}</ref>
*October 14, 2007. [[Robert DziekaÅski Taser incident|Robert DziekaÅski]], a Polish immigrant arriving at the [[Vancouver International Airport]], died after being [[taser]]ed multiple times and four members of the [[Royal Canadian Mounted Police]] (RCMP) crowded on top of DziekaÅski. "The 40-year-old Dziekanski had been at the airport for about 10 hours and, unable to speak English, became confused and agitated while waiting for his mother to meet him."<ref>{{cite news | title =RCMP to review Taser policy in wake of airport death: commissioner |url = http://www.cbc.ca/canada/story/2007/11/17/rcmp-tasers.html | publisher = CBC | date = 2007-11-17 | accessdate = 2007-11-18 }}</ref><ref>{{cite news | title =Taser video shows RCMP shocked immigrant within 25 seconds of their arrival |url = http://www.cbc.ca/canada/british-columbia/story/2007/11/14/bc-taservideo.html | publisher = CBC | date = 2007-11-15 | accessdate = 2007-11-18 }}</ref>
â
[[Image:Dziekanski-tasered.jpg|right|230px|thumb|October 14, [[2007]]: Screenshot from video taken by Paul Pritchard showing Polish immigrant Robert Dziekanski's body on the Vancouver airport floor shortly after he died during an altercation with RCMP officers.]]
 
*January 1, 2009. [[BART Police shooting of Oscar Grant|Oscar Grant]], was shot in the back and killed by Officer Johannes Mehserle while on the ground at [[BART]] station in [[Oakland]] [[California]]. A criminal case is ongoing.
*January 1, 2009. [[BART Police shooting of Oscar Grant|Oscar Grant]], was shot in the back and killed by Officer Johannes Mehserle while on the ground at [[BART]] station in [[Oakland]] [[California]]. A criminal case is ongoing.
